text: Betty Susan Cohen (born July 27, 1956) is an American businesswoman and media executive. She is best known as the founder and original president of Cartoon Network from 1992 to 2001. ==Personal life== Cohen lives in New York City, New York. ==References== ==Other websites== *Betty Cohen Media Consulting Category:1956 births Category:Living people Category:Businesspeople from Wisconsin Category:Cartoon Network Category:Stanford University alumni Category:People from Racine, Wisconsin
title: Betty Cohen
